data.title: Nick Greiner PICK A SIDE Lyrics
meta_keywords: PICK A SIDE lyrics by Nick Greiner
download lyrics of PICK A SIDE by Nick Greiner
Nick Greiner PICK A SIDE lyrics mp3 download
data.meta_description: PICK A SIDE lyrics by Nick Greiner, listen and download latest songs of Nick Greiner with lyrics on Boomplay.
data.text:
If you don't know whose side you're on

You better go decide

I'm with the Lion of Judah

And one day He'll descend from the sky

He was a spotless lamb then died for us

The perfect sacrafice

And I could never pay Him back but best believe that

Imma try

I got a bone to pick

With the one tempting me to sin

You should know that I've been born again

So I want nothing to do with it

I feel alive when I read the script

Every day I see the benefits

Jesus, I'm a representative

Long as I'm living and

Breathing in I follow Him today

I got saved

from the grave

By the only name

Jesus Christ

He's the same

Yesterday

Today

He was slain

For our sake

Everything got paid

I'm a saint

With a flame

That won't fade away

I gotta give this my all

As long I'm living

I pray for my enemies

They probably want me to fall

But Imma forgive em

My favorite remedy

Back then I wanted revenge

Now I don't trip I know God

Will avenge

All of His children I know He defends

Again and again

I got the favor of God on my life

Every day I'm so blessed to be serving the Lord

When I spend time with Him reading the word

I get new revelation that I can't ignore

Then I apply it to my life and try to get closer to

Him like I've never before

Jesus is coming back soon, and when He does everybody

I'm going to look up and stare at a sword Yeah

You got a pick a side

Dark or the light

Yeah

Aye

We know who wins in the end

Jesus Christ yeah

Aye

And He already won

Know that's right yeah

Aye

He's my ride or die

Yeah

I fell for God I'm not

Accident prone

I can't get up on my own

His love is so real and it's

Sweet like a honeycomb

I just can't wait to go home

Lately, I'm finding myself

Out of my comfort zone

I used to want to go cope

Now He guides me everywhere

Like a chaperone

And shows me where I need to go

Everyday

I got saved

from the grave

By the only name

Jesus Christ

He's the same

Yesterday

Today

He was slain

For our sake

Everything got paid

I'm a saint

With a flame

That won't fade away

God's in the limelight

I would rather be a doorkeeper

In the kingdom than cast out of His sight

Had to go and repent for all my sins

Cause I'm been trying to live right

I'm of Child of God no matter what

I got some family times

Locked in real tight

I had to tap in

Cannot be lacking

Devil attacking

He's an assassin

That's why I'm packing

Verses to stab him

They've been impacting

Causing some damage

Prayer and reading the word every day

Gets me ready to fight every demon in sight

We in a war with the enemies camp

But we walking in victory cause of the light
